verses.name: Nehemiah 10:31
verses.text: And if the people of the land bring ware or any victuals on the sabbath day to sell, that we would not buy it of them on the sabbath, or on the holy day: and that we would leave the seventh year, and the exaction of every debt.

verses.name: Nehemiah 10:32
verses.text: Also we made ordinances for us, to charge ourselves yearly with the third part of a shekel for the service of the house of our God;
